specialRules.hint: Enemy units get -1 to their melee rolls when fighting against this unit.
specialRules.name: Chilling
specialRules.label: Chilling
specialRules.description: Enemy units get -1 to their melee rolls when fighting against this unit.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get Regeneration next time they take wounds.
specialRules.name: Corpse Pile
specialRules.label: Corpse Pile
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get Regeneration next time they take wounds.

specialRules.hint: Counts as having the Strider rule, as well as having Regeneration against non-spell attacks (this stacks with Regeneration).
specialRules.name: Ethereal
specialRules.label: Ethereal
specialRules.description: Counts as having the Strider rule, as well as having Regeneration against non-spell attacks (this stacks with Regeneration).

specialRules.hint: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one additional wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.
specialRules.name: Reap
specialRules.label: Reap
specialRules.description: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one additional wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 enemy units within 12” and roll 1 die for each, on a 2+ they take 3 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Reliquary
specialRules.label: Reliquary
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 enemy units within 12” and roll 1 die for each, on a 2+ they take 3 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit fights in melee the enemy must take a morale test. If failed it gets -1 to its melee rolls for this combat.
specialRules.name: Seduce
specialRules.label: Seduce
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit fights in melee the enemy must take a morale test. If failed it gets -1 to its melee rolls for this combat.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 3 dice, for each 2+ it takes 2 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Spectral Touch
specialRules.label: Spectral Touch
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 3 dice, for each 2+ it takes 2 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.
specialRules.name: Undead
specialRules.label: Undead
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.

spells.name: Vigour
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Spectral Wind
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Invocation
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Deadly Gaze
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Dance of Death
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately charge by up to 6” and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: Curse
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” must take a morale test. If failed it takes 1 automatic hit per model.
